datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to classic cars, automotive history, and vintage car restoration.

columns.name: has_won_awards
columns.description: Indicates whether the car has won any awards in car exhibitions

columns.name: has_annual_car_event
columns.description: Indicates whether the country hosts at least one annual classic car event

columns.name: market_rarity_percentile
columns.description: The percentile that indicates how rare the car model is in the market, based on the number of surviving units

columns.name: historical_value_index
columns.description: Numerical index representing the historical significance and value of the car

columns.name: vintage_value_category
columns.description: Categorical representation of the car's value based on its age and historical significance

columns.name: car_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each car

columns.name: average_speed_limit
columns.description: The average speed limit on highways in the country (in km/h)

columns.name: year_of_manufacture
columns.description: Year the car was originally manufactured

columns.name: number_of_owners
columns.description: Total number of owners that the car has had

columns.name: country_of_origin_precision_score
columns.description: Score representing the level of precision engineering of the country where the car was manufactured

columns.name: engine_performance_ratio
columns.description: A ratio of the engine's horsepower to its displacement, indicating overall performance efficiency.

columns.name: region_performance_index
columns.description: Average performance index of cars from the same region

columns.name: exhibition_count
columns.description: Number of times the car has been displayed in classic car exhibitions

columns.name: restoration_method
columns.description: Type of restoration method used, traditional or modern

columns.name: origin_country
columns.description: Country where the car was manufactured

columns.name: engine_displacement_percentile
columns.description: The percentile rank of the car's engine displacement compared to all other cars.

columns.name: predicted_performance_percentile
columns.description: An estimated percentile rank related to the car's expected performance.

columns.name: horsepower
columns.description: Engine power of the car measured in horsepower

columns.name: original_equipment_quality
columns.description: Categorical rating of the original factory equipment's quality.

columns.name: certificate_of_authenticity
columns.description: Indicates if the car comes with a certified document verifying its authenticity and original components

columns.name: car_age
columns.description: Age of the car in years

columns.name: design_luxury_index
columns.description: A numerical index representing the luxury and aesthetic appeal of the car's design.

columns.name: car_show_participation_frequency
columns.description: Number of times the car has participated in vintage car shows annually

columns.name: resale_price
columns.description: Resale price of the car in USD

columns.name: region_demand_for_vintage
columns.description: Average annual demand for vintage cars in the car's region, measured in sales per year

columns.name: maintenance_cost_change
columns.description: Percentage change in maintenance costs for the car over the last 10 years

columns.name: popularity_in_exhibits
columns.description: The percentage of automotive exhibitions in which cars from the same decade as the car have appeared.

columns.name: number_of_car_museums
columns.description: The total number of car museums in the country

columns.name: performance_rating
columns.description: Rating of the car's performance on a scale of 1 to 100

queries.question: What patterns can be observed in the dataset among vintage automobiles with varying car show participation frequencies, maintenance cost changes, and historical value indices that might differentiate their predicted performance percentiles?
